titles: Susanna: or, the arraignment of the two vniust elders
author: Aylett, Robert, 1583-1655?
publisher: Printed for Iohn Teague, and are to be sold at his shoppe in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Ball,
notes: Variant: imprint in another setting, reading: .. at the signe of the gilded Ball.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
